name: Ticked Off
description:
John Tick discovers that the scientific community does not consider ticks bugs, they are arachnid, enact your revenge and kill the scientist in creative ways.

Features:

3 Fun ways to kill the scientist, Tight platforming, 3 reward artworks, Full controller support.

All original sound, music, and art. 

Controls:

Keyboard: Move: WASD Jump: SpaceBar, Interact: E

Ps4 Controller: Move: LeftJoystick, Jump: Cross, Interact: Square

Xbox Controller: Move: LeftJoystick, Jump: A, Interact: X

Credits:

Designer: Matthew Thomas - MatthewThomasGameDesign@gmail.com

Music/sound designer: Mitchell Bergman - hijoord@outlook.com

Programmer - Christopher-Robin Ebbinghaus - contact@cebbinghaus.com

Artist - Tannah Saunders (Antannah) - Tsauh2000@gmail.com

Backtrace Link: https://looksfinetome.sp.backtrace.io/p/BacktraceGameJam3/triage?aggregations=((guid%2Cunique)%2C(classifiers%2Chead))
